Export.Routine:
#include INConst #include COMSYS #include VARConst VARDump RunExport(global,pDirectory) set VORG(1)=global set VORG(2)="" set VORG(3)=pDirectory_global_".XML" set VORG(4)=3 set VORG(5)=59 set VORG(6)="" do ^WWWEXPO q ProcessList(pDirectory) do ^WWWVAR if (($e(pDirectory,$length(pDirectory))'="\") && ($e(pDirectory,$length(pDirectory))'="/")){ if $find(pDirectory,"\")>0 { set pDirectory=pDirectory_"\" }else { if $find(pDirectory,"/")>0 { set pDirectory=pDirectory_"/" }else { set pDirectory=pDirectory_"\" } } } //w !,"Compras Related Data... " do RunExport("VARPedidoCompra",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPedidoCompraLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPedidoCompraEntrega",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPedidoCompraEntregaLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPedidoCompraHistorico",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARCompraEntrega",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARCompraEntregaLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARBancoPrecoLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARBancoPrecoEstimativa",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARBancoPrecoEstimativaLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("ARBancoPrecoEstimativaProp",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARBancoPrecoEstimativaForn",pDirectory) //w !,"Pedido de Transferência Related Data... " do RunExport("VARPreRequisicao",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPreRequisicaoLinha",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPreReqAprovacao",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARPreReqAprovacaoLinha",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Item Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Item Master Related Data... " do RunExport("INART",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTA",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTAVG",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTCHANGE",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTK",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTLP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTLOCPAR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTPACK",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTSP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTUPC",pDirectory) do RunExport("INARTUPC1",pDirectory) do RunExport("INItemGroup",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Med Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - do RunExport("MEDAdmission",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDPrescription",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDPrescriptionDispense",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDAuthorize",pDirectory) //do RunExport("MEDFrequency,^MEDFrequencys //do RunExport("MEDICD,^MEDICDs do RunExport("MEDPatient",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDPrescription",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDPrescriptionIssue",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDPrescriptionLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("MEDProvider",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Location Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Location Master Related Data... " do RunExport("WWW0121",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLPCHIP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLPLAYOUT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLPLAYOUTP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLPLAYOUTSAVE",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Supplier Master Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Supplier Master Related Data... " do RunExport("INLIEF",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLIEFA",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLIEFAccountsLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLIEFCAT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INLIEFD",pDirectory) do RunExport("INSupMastAgree",pDirectory) do RunExport("INSupMastAgreeItem",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAgreeReq",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAgreeReqLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAgreeResp",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAgreeRespLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPARTN",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRAHMEN",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRAHMENGROUP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INREBUCH",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Receive from Supplier Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Receive from Supplier Related Data... " do RunExport("INREC",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRECLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRECSummary",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Requisition Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Requisition Related Data... " do RunExport("INReq",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqFirm",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqIssue",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqRelease",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqSource",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqSourceLineHist",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqSummary",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqTemplate",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqTemplateLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqToSupOrder",pDirectory) do RunExport("INReqToSupOrderLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRequisition",pDirectory) do RunExport("INIssue",pDirectory) do RunExport("INIssueLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INIssuePickLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INIssueRev",pDirectory) do RunExport("INIssueRevLine",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Old SOH Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Old SOH Related Data... " do RunExport("INWE",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEALT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEAUF",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEAUFPT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEAUFVOR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEBUCH",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWECounter",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEFREI",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEINV",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEINVCYC",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEINVP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWER",pDirectory) do RunExport("INWEUM",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;New SOH Related Data (sent by Paul - to be completed) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"New SOH Related Data... " do RunExport("alSOH.dBundleAttributeI",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dBundleI",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dBundleStockD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alINV.dItemPolicyD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alINV.dItemPolicyI",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dSOHD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dStockBalanceD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dStockHistoryD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dStockHistoryI",pDirectory) do RunExport("alDRP.iMovementD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alDRP.iMovementI",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dPeriodBalanceD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dSOHPeriodD",pDirectory) do RunExport("alSOH.dSOHPeriodI",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;DRP Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"DRP Related Data... " do RunExport("INDRPBESTVOR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPBESTVORs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPDEMAND",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPDEMANDHIST",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPDEMANDHISTs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPDEMANDs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPITEM",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPMESPROT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPMESPROTs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPRUNJOB",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPRUNJOBs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPRUNPROT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPSUPPLY",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPSUPPLYs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMBUCH",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMLKW",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMLKWs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMTOUR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMTOURs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMTVOR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPUMTVORs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPWV",pDirectory) do RunExport("INDRPWVs",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Orders Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Orders Related Data... " do RunExport("INAUF",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAUFs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAUF1",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAUFP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INAUFPK",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;New PO Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"New PO Related Data... " do RunExport("INPO",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscount",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscounts",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscountRule",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscountRules",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscounts",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPODiscountss",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOLines",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOLineTemplate",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPORev",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOSummary",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOSummarys",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOTempDO",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPOTemplate",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Transfer Orders Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Transfer Orders Related Data... " do RunExport("INTFR",pDirectory) do RunExport("INTFRLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INTFRPickLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INTFRRev",pDirectory) do RunExport("INTFRRevLine",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Stock Operations Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Stock Operations Related Data... " do RunExport("INADJ",pDirectory) do RunExport("INADJLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INMOV",pDirectory) do RunExport("INMOVLine",pDirectory) do RunExport("INRMA",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Production Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Production Related Data... " do RunExport("INPROPLAN",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPROPLANs",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPROSTEMP",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPROSTEMP1",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPROSTEMPT",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPROSTEMPU",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Numerators Related Data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - //w !,"Numerators Related Data... " do RunExport("WWW1280",pDirectory) ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ;Customer specific data ;- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - do RunExport("VARPrograma",pDirectory) do RunExport("INPARA",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARTCIRua",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARTCIPredio",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARTCIAndar",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARTCIApartamento",pDirectory) do RunExport("VARCMMLinha",pDirectory) q CanRun(Company) set YQ=1 new objDUMP set objDUMP=$get(^VARDump(YM,Company,1)) if objDUMP="" q if $$$VARDumpStatus(objDUMP)=1 { set Q = $$$QDontSave set YQ=1_"Rotina não pode ser processada pois já está em execução" q } set pDirectory=$$$VARDumpDiretorio(objDUMP) if pDirectory="" { set Q = $$$QDontSave set YQ=1_"Rotina não pode ser processada pois não foi designado um diretório." q } set YQ=0 q CanSave(Company) set YQ=1 new objDUMP set objDUMP=$get(^VARDump(YM,Company,1)) if objDUMP="" q if $$$VARDumpStatus(objDUMP)=1 { set Q = $$$QDontSave $$$Alert("Formulário não pode ser salvo, a rotina de exportar está em execução") q } set Q=$$$QSave q Run(Company) new objDUMP set objDUMP=$get(^VARDump(YM,Company,1)) if objDUMP="" do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDump",Company) if $$$VARDumpStatus(objDUMP)=1 { $$$Alert("Rotina não pode ser processada pois está em execução") do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDump",Company) } set pDirectory=$$$VARDumpDiretorio(objDUMP) if pDirectory="" { $$$Alert("Rotina não pode ser processada pois não foi designado um diretório.") do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDump",Company) } set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDUMP)="Cálculo ABC está em execução..." set $$$VARDumpStatus(objDUMP)=1 set strStatus=$$Save^COMUtils("VARABC",Company,objDUMP,1) IF strStatus'=1 { //HARD FAIL, save directly on the global to prevent several jobs running set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(^VARDump(YM,Company,1))="Cálculo ABC está em execução..." SET $$$VARDumpStatus(^VARDump(YM,Company,1))=0 } job JobDump(Company,pDirectory) do GoToForm^COMUtilForm("VARDump",Company) q OnAfterDataFields(Company) new objDUMP set objDUMP=$get(^VARDump(YM,Company,1)) if objDUMP="" q if $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDUMP)="" { write "
" write "
" write " Status:" write "
Rotina de exportar dados não foi executada nesse ambiente." write "
" write "
" }else { write "
" write "
" write " Status:" write "
"_$$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDUMP) write "
" write "
" } q JobDump(Company,pDirectory,verbose=0) //Set status to started if $GET(YM)=""{ do ^WWWVAR set YBED="SYSTEM" } new objDump set objDump=$get(^VARDump(YM,Company,1)) try { do ProcessList(pDirectory) set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDump)="Execução foi completada na data e hora -> "_$ZDATETIME($H,4)_" . No diretório "_pDirectory_"" set $$$VARDumpStatus(objDump)=0 set strStatus=$$Save^COMUtils("VARDump",Company,objDump,1) if strStatus'=$$$OK { //HARD FAIL, restart execution control on the global set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDump)="Execução foi completada na data e hora -> "_$ZDATETIME($H,4)_" . No diretório "_pDirectory_"" SET $$$VARDumpStatus(^VARDump(YM,Company,1))=0 } }catch { set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDump)="Falha na execução da rotina de exportar dados, por favor contate o suporte. Execução falhou na data e hora -> "_$ZDATETIME($H,4)_" . No diretório "_pDirectory_"" set $$$VARDumpStatus(objDump)=0 set strStatus=$$Save^COMUtils("VARDump",Company,objDump,1) if strStatus'=$$$OK { //HARD FAIL, restart execution control on the global set $$$VARDumpMsgStatus(objDump)="Falha na execução da rotina de exportar dados, por favor contate o suporte. Execução falhou na data e hora -> "_$ZDATETIME($H,4)_" . No diretório "_pDirectory_"" SET $$$VARDumpStatus(^VARDump(YM,Company,1))=0 } } q
